email_body:
{person}, you have been assigned {target} for Secret Santa! Please get them a gift you think they would like between $15-$30. Avoid telling other people who you are assigned in order to keep everything a surprise.

This email was automated, so if you somehow got assigned someone you've already had before, please let everyone know.

Time and place will be determined at a later date.

Sincerely,
Secret Santa Bot
